body_html: Yes, we have been publishing packages for TensorFlow (including TensorBoard) since the final release of version 0.12. AFAIK, the issue with Windows-style paths is still an open issue (see #7856) but there is a workaround that involves specifying a run name.
body_text: Yes, we have been publishing packages for TensorFlow (including TensorBoard) since the final release of version 0.12. AFAIK, the issue with Windows-style paths is still an open issue (see #7856) but there is a workaround that involves specifying a run name.
body: Yes, we have been publishing packages for TensorFlow (including TensorBoard) since the final release of version 0.12. AFAIK, the issue with Windows-style paths is still an open issue (see #7856) but there is a workaround that involves specifying a run name.
